title: PUBLIC NOTICE

details.body:
Sunday 05th May 2013

To

Thursday 09th May 2013

We remain open to British Nationals in distress during this time.

Normal service will resume on

Sunday 12th May 2013

Also Embassy will be closed on

28th May 2013

The British Consular Section apologise for any inconvenience In cases of emergency when the Embassy is closed please contact 015 677 5500

government.title: 2010 to 2015 Conservative and Liberal Democrat coalition government

description: The Consular Section will be closed for documentary services and submitting passport applications on:
